name: @abstract-names/sdk
description: React SDK for Abstract Names - name resolution and profiles

scripts.prerelease: pnpm format && pnpm lint && pnpm typecheck && pnpm build
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && pnpm check:changelog && pnpm prerelease && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && pnpm check:changelog && pnpm prerelease && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm version major && pnpm check:changelog && pnpm prerelease && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public

author: Abstract Names
